body.name: Stove Cover - Reusable Stove Top Covers For Gas Burners Stove Top Guard For Samsung Stove Top Protector With 2PCS Stove Gap Covers 3PCS Cleaning Brushes - Non-Stick Gas Stove Cover

features: ✅ ATTENTION - Please check your stove size to ensure a perfect fit. If needed, you can easily cut the gas stove cover to match your burners. The distance between the stove mat and the flame should be at least 2cm. If the cover doesn't fit, contact us for a hassle-free solution!

✅ Ultimate Heat Resistance - Our gas stove burner covers can withstand high temperatures up to 315°C/600℉ for gas stoves and 230°C/446℉ for electric stoves. They provide excellent protection for your cooktop, preventing melting, burning, or deforming. Please avoid direct contact with fire.

✅ Safe and Non-Toxic Material - Made of 0.3mm double layer thickness, PTFE coating, and fiberglass, our gas stovetop covers are upgraded to food-grade quality. It is BPA/PFOA free, environmentally friendly, and hygienic. Cook with confidence on your Samsung gas stove without any odor or impact.

✅ Easy to Clean and Reusable - Our non-stick gas stove top guard makes cleaning a breeze. Simply wipe them with a towel during daily use. When they get too dirty, wash them with soap in the sink or dishwasher. They are reusable, saving you time and money on replacements.

✅ Complete Kitchen Protection - With this perfect combination, you will receive: 1PCS of stove top guards + 2PCS of 21-inch silicone stove counter gap covers + 3PCS cleaning brushes. The stove top protector liners are fully compatible with gas stoves, and the precise perforations ensure a seamless fit. The stove side gap guards can be trimmed to fit your unique stove and counter setup. Protect your kitchen from spills, stains, and gaps with our comprehensive solution.
body.description: Why Opt for Our Products? PREMIUM THICKNESS Experience the highest quality with our gas stove top liners featuring a premium non-stick coating on both sides, measuring a substantial 0.3mm in thickness—thicker than standard alternatives. This ensures a perfect fit with your stove, without any curling issues. 100% NON-TOXIC & HIGH HEAT RESISTANCE Our stove mats are crafted from materials that are 100% free from BPA, PFOA, ensuring the safety of you and your family. With the capability to withstand temperatures of up to 600F (315°C), these mats effectively protect your stove from potential damage caused by hot pans and pots. COST-EFFECTIVE COMBO KIT Combining the stove top mat with a matching silicone stove counter gap cover. Together, they efficiently catch spills and drips, preventing damage to your stove surfaces. This also safeguards your kitchen from stains, helping to maintain the pristine appearance of your cooktop.Additionally, the kit includes 3 cleaning brushes, ensuring easily tackle tough stains in your kitchen on a daily basis.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fits good enough
reviews.reviewText: Not a perfect fit, but for the price it's not bad. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT RECOMMEND!!
reviews.reviewText: Cheap and flimsy, didn’t lay flat on the stove and looked terrible. It burned on the first use and now is unusable. Total waste of money!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value to money comes with brush and cover kit and gap cover protector
reviews.reviewText: This gas stove burner cover comes with brushes too, It Prevent oil from spilling into the burner of the gas stove during cooking.Dishwashable gas stove burner cover kit is more trouble-free and saves you the time to clean the stove.Gas range cover top and stove counter gap cover protect your stove from mess and grease.burner covers make your stove bright and clean, always in a new look. stove protector for Samsung stove reduce your cleaning time and make cooking enjoyful and easier.Stove guard can be reused for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not cut to fit
reviews.reviewText: I have tried this at several angles and it just is not cut to fit. If you center the middle burner, the outer edges are pulled too close to the other burners and gap on the inner sides. If you center one side of the burners, the other side is way off and spills can easily get under it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: El material es bueno pero para la cocina es muy pequeño

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not excited about the side covers
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I just installed it, I didn’t like the side covers because they are lifted up instead of sticked down.I’ll share a review after a couple of days about the rest of the product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Clean
reviews.reviewText: The cleaning brushes make maintaining my stove cover a breeze. They are effective and durable, ensuring that my kitchen stays in top condition. A great addition to any kitchen!
